```{r}
library(pak)
pak::local_install("hewr", ask = FALSE)
pak::pkg_install("epidatr", ask = FALSE)
library(fable)
library(epidatr)
```

## Load data


```{r}
signals <- c("pct_ed_visits_covid","pct_ed_visits_influenza", "pct_ed_visits_rsv")
latest_us_data <- pub_covidcast(
  source = "nssp",
  signals = signals,
  geo_type = "nation",
  time_type = "week",
  as_of = NULL,
)


head(latest_us_data)
```
